SELECT e.date AS confirmDate, sum(IF(e.xzdm LIKE'610902%',1,0)) AS hbq, sum(IF(e.xzdm LIKE'610921%',1,0)) AS hyx, sum(IF(e.xzdm LIKE'610922%',1,0)) AS sqx, sum(IF(e.xzdm LIKE'610923%',1,0)) AS nsx, sum(IF(e.xzdm LIKE'610924%',1,0)) AS zyx, sum(IF(e.xzdm LIKE'610925%',1,0)) AS lgx, sum(IF(e.xzdm LIKE'610926%',1,0)) AS plx, sum(IF(e.xzdm LIKE'610927%',1,0)) AS zpx, sum(IF(e.xzdm LIKE'610928%',1,0)) AS xyx, sum(IF(e.xzdm LIKE'610929%',1,0)) AS bhx, count(0) AS total FROM ( SELECT a.*,IF(b.phone = NULL, 0, 1) AS STATUS,c.name as name FROM ( SELECT sj,gsd,lx,dfds,date,xzdm FROM sjhm
AND xzdm LIKE concat(#{param.area},'%')
AND date >= str_to_date(#{param.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND date <= str_to_date(#{param.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY sj) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT phone FROM troubleshoot_info
and phone_status = '0'
and phone_status != '0'
GROUP BY phone) b ON (a.sj = b.phone) INNER JOIN district c on(c.code = a.xzdm) ) e
and e.STATUS = '1'
GROUP BY e.date ORDER BY e.date ASC
